scripts.build-renderer: cd ../renderer; npm run build; cd ../main; mkdir -p ./build/html; cp -r ../renderer/build/* ./build/html
scripts.start: wait-on http://localhost:3000 && NODE_ENV=dev nodemon --watch ./src/index.js --watch ./src/*.js --watch ./src/**/*.js --exec 'npm run electron'
scripts.dist: npm run build-renderer; rm -rf dist/; NODE_ENV=prod electron-builder
scripts.dist-mac: npm run build-renderer; rm -rf dist/; NODE_ENV=prod electron-builder --mac
